docs.abstract: Turkish banks’ ability to swap liras for foreign currencies was curbed. The lira has been dropping since President Trump said he would raise tariffs on Turkish imports.
docs.snippet: Turkish banks’ ability to swap liras for foreign currencies was curbed. The lira has been dropping since President Trump said he would raise tariffs on Turkish imports.
docs.lead_paragraph: Turkey’s main banking regulator curbed the ability of Turkish banks to swap liras for foreign currencies in an announcement on its website late Sunday night.

headline.main: Turkish Regulators Step In to Deal With Fall in Lira

docs.abstract: Tim Lee, an obscure economist who writes an investment newsletter, predicted that Turkey’s currency would collapse. Now, he foresees a broader financial crisis.
docs.snippet: Tim Lee, an obscure economist who writes an investment newsletter, predicted that Turkey’s currency would collapse. Now, he foresees a broader financial crisis.
docs.lead_paragraph: For the past seven years, Tim Lee has been warning that a financial crisis in Turkey would set off a wider calamity in global markets.

headline.main: Turkey’s Financial Crisis Surprised Many. Except This Analyst.
headline.print_headline: For Doomsayer, Turkey’s Woes Are No Surprise

docs.abstract: Recent commercial real estate transactions in New York.
docs.snippet: Recent commercial real estate transactions in New York.

docs.abstract: Most people think of soda as a bottled beverage. But the sweet, bubbly drink actually got its start as a mixed-to-order tonic.
docs.snippet: Most people think of soda as a bottled beverage. But the sweet, bubbly drink actually got its start as a mixed-to-order tonic.
docs.lead_paragraph: PepsiCo’s $3.2 billion purchase of SodaStream is an idea right out of the past.

headline.main: PepsiCo Returns to Soda’s Roots With Its SodaStream Deal

docs.abstract: Your mobile device and computer already have thousands of those colorful pictographs available. But if you can’t find the exact one to communicate your mood, make your own.
docs.snippet: Your mobile device and computer already have thousands of those colorful pictographs available. But if you can’t find the exact one to communicate your mood, make your own.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. Can I make my own emoji if I don’t see a character on my phone that fits my needs? Where do the ones on the phone keyboard come from?

headline.main: Create Your Own Emoji Characters, One Way or Another

docs.abstract: The investment of venture capital money into ad tech start-ups is falling sharply, helping push a wave of acquisitions.
docs.snippet: The investment of venture capital money into ad tech start-ups is falling sharply, helping push a wave of acquisitions.
docs.lead_paragraph: Online advertising companies have struggled for several years as Google and Facebook solidified their grip on digital dollars, slowing revenue for the others.

headline.main: Google-Facebook Dominance Hurts Ad Tech Firms, Speeding Consolidation
headline.print_headline: Web Giants’ Dominance Prompts Ad Tech Companies to Scramble

docs.abstract: Tesla’s stock tumbled 10 percent Friday, generating more than $1 billion in profits for investors betting on a fall in the electric-car maker’s shares.
docs.snippet: Tesla’s stock tumbled 10 percent Friday, generating more than $1 billion in profits for investors betting on a fall in the electric-car maker’s shares.
docs.lead_paragraph: Get the DealBook newsletter to make sense of major business and policy headlines — and the power-brokers who shape them.__________

headline.main: Investors Betting Against Tesla Made $1 Billion on Friday
headline.print_headline: $1 Billion  Gift To Investors Who Want Tesla to Fail

docs.abstract: A move by the company has put one of the country’s most iconic brands in the uncomfortable position of clashing with a president who is immensely popular with most of its customers.
docs.snippet: A move by the company has put one of the country’s most iconic brands in the uncomfortable position of clashing with a president who is immensely popular with most of its customers.
docs.lead_paragraph: STURGIS, S.D. — Gary Rathbun rumbled into South Dakota to attend the United States’ pre-eminent gathering of motorcycle enthusiasts atop his Harley-Davidson, a 2009 Ultra Classic that brought him 800 miles from Idaho. It is the 40th Harley he has owned. It is also likely to be his last.

headline.main: Trump’s War With Harley-Davidson Has Divided America’s Bikers
headline.print_headline: Trade Clash Pits Harley Vs. Trump And Bikers

docs.abstract: The father of a victim of the Sandy Hook shooting has tried to erase lies about his son from the internet, but Automattic, which runs WordPress.com, says “untrue content is not banned.”
docs.snippet: The father of a victim of the Sandy Hook shooting has tried to erase lies about his son from the internet, but Automattic, which runs WordPress.com, says “untrue content is not banned.”
docs.lead_paragraph: Leonard Pozner says he spends hours every day trying to erase online conspiracy theories that the death of his 6-year-old son Noah at the Sandy Hook Elementary School was a hoax.

headline.main: This Company Keeps Lies About Sandy Hook on the Web
headline.print_headline: Sandy Hook Father Combats Lies, and a Blog Site’s Policy

byline.original: By Sapna Maheshwari and John Herrman

docs.abstract: The Black Elevation page held rallies, posted videos and encouraged the fight against racism. Whoever ran it even interviewed a job applicant.
docs.snippet: The Black Elevation page held rallies, posted videos and encouraged the fight against racism. Whoever ran it even interviewed a job applicant.
docs.lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO — Black Elevation appeared to be an organization dedicated to fighting racism to the tens of thousands of people who visited its page on Facebook.

headline.main: How a Fake Group on Facebook Created Real Protests
headline.print_headline: Real Protests From a Sham On Facebook
